Tomas: Moraćemo da se doteramo za derbi
Najbolji košarkaš Partizana sa jučerašnje utakmice tvrdi da ovaj poraz neće negativno uticati na ekipu

06 Nov 2019

Imao je kasno sinoć Partizan šanse da meč prelomi i reši u svoju korist, ali je nekim greškama dozvolio Veneciji da prezume inicijativu i sa nekoliko trojki prelomi susret u trećem kvartalu. Pokušao je da stvar spase Rašon Tomas, koji je bio najefikasniji košarkaš u redovima crno-belih, ali nije uspeo.
On kaže da će Partizan iz ovog poraza izvući ono najbolje.“Težak poraz za nas i očigledno je da smo razočarani. Ali kao što je i trener rekao, stekli smo dovoljno dobar kapital da nas ovaj poraz ne boli toliko. Samo nas je naučio jednoj važnoj lekciji i pokazao koje stvari moramo da poboljšamo. Treba nastaviti dalje”, izjavio je Amerikanac.
Govoreći o individualnom učinku, Tomas je rekao da je možda mogao i bolje da odigra u nekim segmentima.“Mislim da sam mogao da uradim dosta više da pomognem timu. Postigao sam dosta poena, ali mogao sam da neke druge stvari obavim bolje”.
Preostalo je svega desetak dana do sudara sa Crvenom zvezdom. Tomas tvrdi da uzbuđenje polako raste, ali i da će njegov tim pokušati da odigra na nivou pred domaćom publikom.“Znam da će to biti velika utakmica. Moraćemo da se dobro ‘doteramo’ za taj susret i da odigramo dobro pred našim navijačima”, zaključio je američki košarkaš.
Piše: Srđan TODOROVIĆFoto: MN Press

Thomas: We'll have to dress up for the derby
Partizan's best basketball player from yesterday's game claims that this defeat will not adversely affect the team

06 Nov 2019

Partizan had a chance to break the match late and settle in its favor late last night, but by some mistakes allowed Venice to take the initiative and by a few threes break the encounter in the third quarter. He tried to save the matter by Rashon Thomas, who was the most efficient basketball player in the black and white, but failed.
He says Partizan will get the best out of this defeat. ”A heavy defeat for us and obviously we are disappointed. But as the coach said, we have acquired good enough capital that this defeat does not hurt us so much. He just taught us one important lesson and showed us what things we need to improve. We need to move on, ”the American said.
Talking about individual performance, Thomas said he may have played better in some segments. "I think I could have done a lot more to help the team. I scored a lot of points, but I could have done other things better. "
There are only ten days left until the collision with the Red Star. Thomas claims that the excitement is slowly growing, but also that his team will try to play on a level before the home crowd. "I know it will be a big game. We will have to 'dress up' well for that match and play well in front of our fans, ”the American basketball player concluded.
By: Srdjan TODOROVICPhoto: MN Press
